label: Contractor employees must complete necessary forms for security or other reasons, including background investigations.
quote: Contractor employees working on this contract must complete such forms as may be necessary for security or other reasons, including the conduct of background investigations to determine suitability.

label: Completed forms shall be submitted as directed by the Contracting Officer.
quote: Completed forms shall be submitted as directed by the Contracting Officer.

label: Contractor employees shall be fingerprinted or subject to other investigations as required.
quote: Upon the Contracting Officer’s request, the Contractor’s employees shall be fingerprinted or subject to other investigations as required.

label: All Contractor employees requiring recurring access to government facilities or access to CUI or information resources are required to have a favorably adjudicated background investigation prior to commencing work unless waived.
quote: All Contractor employees requiring recurring access to government facilities or access to CUI or information resources are required to have a favorably adjudicated background investigation prior to commencing work on this contract unless this requirement is waived under departmental procedures.

label: Contractor may be required to prohibit individuals from working on the contract if deemed contrary to public interest.
quote: The Contracting Officer may require the Contractor to prohibit individuals from working on the contract if the Government deems their initial or continued employment contrary to the public interest for any reason, including, but not limited to, carelessness, insubordination, incompetence, or security concerns.

label: Contractor shall access and use CUI only for the purpose of furnishing advice or assistance directly to the Government and shall not disclose CUI unless authorized in writing.
quote: The Contractor shall access and use CUI only for the purpose of furnishing advice or assistance directly to the Government in support of the Government’s activities, and shall not disclose, orally or in writing, CUI for any other purpose to any person unless authorized in writing by the Contracting Officer.

label: Contractor shall ensure authorized employees receive initial and refresher training on CUI protection and disclosure.
quote: For those Contractor employees authorized to access CUI, the Contractor shall ensure that these persons receive initial and refresher training concerning the protection and disclosure of CUI. Initial training shall be completed within 60 days of contract award and refresher training shall be completed every 2 years thereafter.

label: Contractor shall include this clause in all subcontracts at any tier where the subcontractor may have access to government facilities, CUI, or information resources.
quote: The Contractor shall include this clause in all subcontracts at any tier where the subcontractor may have access to government facilities, CUI, or information resources.

label: Each individual employed under the contract shall be a U.S. citizen or a lawfully admitted permanent resident, with exceptions approved by the Chief Security Officer.
quote: Each individual employed under the contract shall be a citizen of the United States of America, or an alien who has been lawfully admitted for permanent residence as evidenced by a Permanent Resident Card (USCIS I-551). Any exceptions must be approved by the Department’s Chief Security Officer or designee.
